mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richmond ladies going to receive government rations
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sketched by A. R. Waud. Don't you think that Yankee must feel like shrinking into his boots before such high-toned Southern ladies as we?
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Waud, Alfred R. (Alfred Rudolph), 1828-1891
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harper's Weekly
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Women -- Virginia -- Richmond; War damage -- Virginia -- Richmond; Rationing -- Virginia -- Richmond
Virginia -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Destruction & pillage
F234.R52
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Scanned with Epson Expression 10000 XL, using Photoshop CS4, at 8-bit grayscale, 600 ppi.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: James Branch Cabell Library. Special Collections and Archives
